full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DKA' GNAD BRGYAD KYI ZIN BRIS RJE'I GSUNG BZHIN BRJED BYANG DU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,,DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN GYI GSUNG GI GDAMS PA MI NYAMS PA'I PHYIR DU, ,THEG PA MCHOG GI BRTUL ZHUGS LA GNAS PA'I DGE SLONG DAR MA RIN CHEN GYIS BRJED BYANG DU BRIS PA'O, 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR DGA' LDAN THEG CHEN GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL,,
